variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Participant ID [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: Contact occasion [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use]

variable.name: ADRB1
variable.description: 1. Since your Jackson Heart Study Exam 1 have you consumed alcoholic beverages? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use]
variable.value: Stopped drinking more than one year ago 3

variable.name: ADRB2A
variable.description: 2. During the past 12 months, on the average, how many days per (weeks, month, or year) consumed any alcoholic beverage? Number of days. [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use]

variable.name: ADRB2B
variable.description: 2b. During the past 12 months, on the average, how many days per (weeks, month, or year) consumed any alcoholic beverage? Number of days. Per [UNIT OF TIME] [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use]

variable.name: ADRB3
variable.description: 3. On the average, on the days that you drank alcohol, how many drinks [by drink, I mean a 12-ounce beer, a four-ounce glass of wine, or an ounce of liquor] did you have a day? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use]

variable.name: ADRB4
variable.description: 4. When you drink, do you usually drink beer, wine, or liquor? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use]
variable.value: No preference or can not say

variable.name: ADRB5
variable.description: 5. Was there ever a time or times in your life since your JHS Exam 1 when you drank 5 or more drinks of any kind of alcoholic beverage almost every day? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use]

variable.name: ADRB6
variable.description: 6. Since your JHS Exam 1 have you ever used crack or cocaine in any form? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use]

variable.name: ADRB7
variable.description: 7. About how many times in your lifetime have you used crack or cocaine [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use]

variable.name: ADRB8
variable.description: 8. Since your JHS Exam 1 have you ever used any other kinds of drugs including marijuana, heroine, or others? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use]

variable.name: ADRBflag
variable.description: Data record present? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use]

variable.name: VERS
variable.description: Form version [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use]
